message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I understand that $120 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $105 is still more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $100. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, though. I'll sell the product to you for $98.
